channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AK
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AK

item.title: Report X-2024070306
item.description:
Report X-2024070306

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-08T18:15:44+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-02
  • City: ANCHORAGE
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: AT THE UPS FACILITY IN ANCHORAGE, ALASKA, ONE GROUND TO ALASKA PACKAGE WAS FOUND LEAKING AN UNKNOWN POWDERY GRANULAR SUBSTANCE. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED ONE ACDELCO NON-SPILLABLE BATTERY PACKED WITH ABSORBENT CAT LITER MATERIAL. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THE OUTER BOX IS UN SPECIFICATION PACKAGING. NON SPILLABLE BATTERY IS NOT INDICATED ON THE OUTER BOX.

item.title: Report I-2024070010
item.description:
Report I-2024070010

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-08T18:15:44+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-21
  • City: Anchorage
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: DHL EXPRESS (USA), INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On 06/21/2024 hidden dangerous goods were discovered during the shipment inspection process at the DHL ANC Service Center, 6300 Boeing Ave, Anchorage, AK 99502 Transportation by road confirmed. Shipment also contains UN3481 Lithium ion batteries packed with equipment Class 9 Single Package or Inner Packaging(if any): Packaging Type: Case Material of Construction: Plastic Package Capacity: 388 g Amount in Package: 388 g Number in Shipment 1 Number Failed: 1

item.title: Report X-2024070169
item.description:
Report X-2024070169

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-05T18:14:58+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-01
  • City: ANCHORAGE
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On 7/1/2024 at approximately 1200, Dangerous Goods Administration received a call from Employee 261690 at the ramp faiility in Anchorage, reporting a dangeorus goods spill. The shipment consisted one fiberboard box containig 4 plastic drums, individually packaged inside of smaller fiberboard box. One of the plastic drums leaked from the closure, resulting in spillage. This shipment was prepared under IATA Special Provision A197 and did not shipped as fully regulated DG. The shipper will be contacted for further disposition.
